title: S13 Ep127: Near Death & The Demon Battle for Life
itunes:title: Near Death & The Demon Battle for Life
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is witness to Near Death & The Demon Battle for Life with former police officer Greg Clark.
LISTEN ANYTIME HERE:

Greg Clark entered what he thought was the darkest part of his life, but it was nothing compared to his Near Death Experience and his battle against Dark Forces to return to life.

Former Minneapolis Police officer Greg Clark joins Dave & Tim in a very personal story of life, death and redemption.
